verses.verse: ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the land צִלְצַ֣ל <S%H6767><s%> shadowing כְּנָפָ֑יִם <S%H3671><s%> with wings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Which מֵעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> which [is] beyond לְנַֽהֲרֵי־ <S%H5104><s%> the rivers כֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H3568><s%> of Ethiopia

הַשֹּׁלֵ֨חַ <S%H7971><s%> That sendeth בַּיָּ֜ם <S%H3220><s%> by the sea צִירִ֗ים <S%H6735><s%> ambassadors וּבִכְלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> even in vessels גֹמֶא֮ <S%H1573><s%> of bulrushes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> upon מַיִם֒ <S%H4325><s%> the waters לְכ֣וּ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> Go מַלְאָכִ֣ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers קַלִּ֗ים <S%H7031><s%> ye swift אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גּוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> to a nation מְמֻשָּׁ֣ךְ <S%H4900><s%> scattered וּמוֹרָ֔ט <S%H4178><s%> and peeled אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> to a people נוֹרָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> terrible מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וָהָ֑לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> from their beginning hitherto גּ֚וֹי <S%H1471><s%> a nation קַו־ קָ֣ו <S%H6978><s%> meted out וּמְבוּסָ֔ה <S%H4001><s%> and trodden down אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Whose בָּזְא֥וּ <S%H958><s%> have spoiled נְהָרִ֖ים <S%H5104><s%> the rivers אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> whose land

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> All ye inhabitants תֵבֵ֖ל <S%H8398><s%> of the world וְשֹׁ֣כְנֵי <S%H7931><s%> and dwellers אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> on the earth כִּנְשֹׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> ye when he lifteth up נֵ֤ס <S%H5251><s%> an ensign הָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> on the mountains תִּרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> see וְכִתְקֹ֥עַ <S%H8628><s%> and when he bloweth שׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> a trumpet תִּשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <S%H8085><s%> hear ס

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֨ה <S%H3541><s%> For so אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about [אֶשְׁקֹוטָה כ] (אֶשְׁקֳטָ֖ה <S%H8252><s%> appease ק) וְאַבִּ֣יטָה <S%H5027><s%> and I will consider בִמְכוֹנִ֑י <S%H4349><s%> in my dwelling place כְּחֹ֥ם <S%H2527><s%> heat צַח֙ <S%H6703><s%> like a clear עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> and א֔וֹר <S%H219><s%> sunshine כְּעָ֥ב <S%H5645><s%> [and] like a cloud טַ֖ל <S%H2919><s%> of dew בְּחֹ֥ם <S%H2527><s%> in the heat קָצִֽיר׃ <S%H7105><s%> of harvest

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> For afore קָצִיר֙ <S%H7105><s%> the harvest כְּתָם־ <S%H8552><s%> is perfect פֶּ֔רַח <S%H6525><s%> when the bud וּבֹ֥סֶר <S%H1155><s%> and the sour grape גֹּמֵ֖ל <S%H1580><s%> is ripening יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> becomes נִצָּ֑ה <S%H5328><s%> in the flower וְכָרַ֤ת <S%H3772><s%> he shall both cut off הַזַּלְזַלִּים֙ <S%H2150><s%> the sprigs בַּמַּזְמֵר֔וֹת <S%H4211><s%> with pruning hooks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּטִישׁ֖וֹת <S%H5189><s%> the branches הֵסִ֥יר <S%H5493><s%> and take away הֵתַֽז׃ <S%H8456><s%> [and] cut down

יֵעָזְב֤וּ <S%H5800><s%> They shall be left יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> together לְעֵ֣יט <S%H5861><s%> unto the fowls הָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains וּֽלְבֶהֱמַ֖ת <S%H929><s%> and to the beasts הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְקָ֤ץ <S%H6972><s%> shall summer עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> of הָעַ֔יִט <S%H5861><s%> and the fowls וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֶּהֱמַ֥ת <S%H929><s%> upon them and all the beasts הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> and תֶּחֱרָֽף׃ <S%H2778><s%> shall winter

בָּעֵת֩ <S%H6256><s%> In that time הַהִ֨יא <S%H1931><s%> he יֽוּבַל־ <S%H2986><s%> be brought שַׁ֜י <S%H7862><s%> shall the present לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עַ֚ם <S%H5971><s%> of a people מְמֻשָּׁ֣ךְ <S%H4900><s%> scattered וּמוֹרָ֔ט <S%H4178><s%> and peeled וּמֵעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and from a people נוֹרָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> terrible מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וָהָ֑לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> from their beginning hitherto גּ֣וֹי ׀ <S%H1471><s%> a nation קַו־ קָ֣ו <S%H6978><s%> meted out וּמְבוּסָ֗ה <S%H4001><s%> and trodden under foot אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> Whose בָּזְא֤וּ <S%H958><s%> have spoiled נְהָרִים֙ <S%H5104><s%> the rivers אַרְצ֔וֹ <S%H776><s%> whose land אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְק֛וֹם <S%H4725><s%> to the place שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> of the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> the mount צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> Zion ס
